64/128-bit WEP, WPA, WPA2 WPA3 encryption standards *EZ WPS - Wi-Fi configuration setting in just 2 steps with WPS hardware push button *[[ASUS USB-AC58]] • AC1300 Dual-band USB Adapter :FCC ID: MSQ-USB8C00 (2021-08-05) :USB\VID_0B05&PID_19AA • [[ASUS]] :USB\VID_0BDA&PID_B812 • [[Realtek]] :USB\VID_0BDA&PID_B81A • [[Realtek]] ===Models=== *[[ASUS USB-AC53 Nano]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8812BU :FCC ID: MSQ-USBACRN00 • 0b05:184c *[[ASUS USB-AC54 B1]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8812BU :FCC ID: MSQ-USBACRU00 • 0b05:1841 *[[ASUS USB-AC55 B1]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8812BU :FCC ID: MSQ-USBACRU00 • 0b05:1841 *[[ASUS USB-AC57]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8812BU :FCC ID: MSQ-USBACRU00 • 0b05:1841 *[[ASUS USB-AC58]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8812BU :FCC ID: MSQ-USB8C00 • 0b05:19aa *[[ASUS USB-AC68]] • AC1900 Dual Band USB WiFi Adapter • [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Adapters/All-series/USB-AC68 PPage] *[[ASUS USB-BT500]] • Bluetooth 5.0 Adapter :[[Realtek]] RTL8761B (RTK_BT_5.0) • 0b05:190e *[[Realtek RTL8812BU USB Module]] • USB 3.0 :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8812BU USB 3.0 Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8812BU TX2-RTL8812BU] (2017-07-26) ==See also== :;[https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/WiFi-6/All-series/filter?Category=Wireless-Adapters WiFi 6 Wireless Adapters] *[[ASUS USB-AX56]] -
